records.Name: id_adcloud
records.Description__c: Adobe Advertising Cloud DSP (Demand Side Platform) ID

records.Name: disco
records.Description__c: Used to verify the last Salesforce org that was accessed on the same browser for session discovery

records.Name: inst
records.Description__c: Used to optimize routing to the user's instance

records.Name: alohaEpt
records.Description__c: Used to log page load EPT (Experience Page Time) for Classic UI pages

records.Name: webact
records.Description__c: Used to collect metrics per page view for personalization.

records.Name: BrowserId
records.Description__c: Used to collect metrics, such as the number of visitors to a community.

records.Name: autocomplete
records.Description__c: Used to determine whether the browser remembers a userÕs login username.

records.Name: oinfo
records.Description__c: Used to track the State, Edition and orgID of a customer's org.

records.Name: _ga
records.Description__c: A third-party cookie thatÕs used if the community admin chooses toÊtrack community users with a Google Analytics tracking ID.

records.Name: directMessage InboxVisit Timestamp
records.Description__c: Used by Direct Message to determine the last visit to the inbox.

records.Name: expid_
records.Description__c: Used to render pages based on specified brand.

records.Name: sid_Client
records.Description__c: Used to validate orgid and userid on the client side.

records.Name: sid
records.Description__c: Used to validate user session.

records.Name: renderCtx
records.Description__c: Used to track community context.

records.Name: RRetURL
records.Description__c: Used for "log in as" to return to original page

records.Name: RRetURL2
records.Description__c: Used for portal "log in as" to return to original page

records.Name: rsid
records.Description__c: Used for an admin user to "log in as" one of their org user

records.Name: rsid2
records.Description__c: Used for an admin user to "log in as" one of their org portal user

records.Name: pctrk
records.Description__c: Used to distinguish guest users from each other. No user info stored

records.Name: QCQQ
records.Description__c: UsedÊto detect the official login page for Forced Login POST detection

records.Name: idccsrf
records.Description__c: Used for SSO authentication as CSRF protection

records.Name: sfdc-stream
records.Description__c: Used to redirect server requests for sticky sessions.

records.Name: clientSrc
records.Description__c: Used to validate the IP from where a user logs in.

records.Name: force-stream
records.Description__c: Used to redirect server requests for sticky sessions.

records.Name: oid
records.Description__c: Used to redirect a user to the correct Salesforce org and assist the user for the next login.
